subject: p13896515
History: Year old man with new O2 requirment and agitation. Eval for pulmonary edema, pna.
Findings: Compared with the recent radiographs, there has been interval improvement in the degree of pulmonary edema. The heart remains enlarged. No focal consolidation or pleural effusion. Left-sided pacemaker remains in place.
Impression: Continued improvement/resolution of pulmonary edema. No focal consolidation concerning for pneumonia.
